card.name: Energy Stream
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Evolution Blueprint
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Bolmeteus Sapphire Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead.

card.name: Kodamanma, All-Devouring Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Father Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Miradante, Time Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures. Those creatures don't untap at the start of his next turn. ■ Revolution 0—If you have no shields, your opponent can't summon creatures.

card.name: Miradante, Time Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures. Those creatures don't untap at the start of his next turn. ■ Revolution 0—If you have no shields, your opponent can't summon creatures.

card.name: Miradante, Time Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures. Those creatures don't untap at the start of his next turn. ■ Revolution 0—If you have no shields, your opponent can't summon creatures.

card.name: Miradante, Time Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures. Those creatures don't untap at the start of his next turn. ■ Revolution 0—If you have no shields, your opponent can't summon creatures.

card.name: Mirac, Time Ball
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Escape

card.name: The Lost, Dark Armor
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is in your graveyard, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Death the Lost, Demon Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards their hand. ■ Revolution 0—Whenever this creature attacks, if you have no shields, it breaks all your opponent's shields.

card.name: Death the Lost, Demon Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards their hand. ■ Revolution 0—Whenever this creature attacks, if you have no shields, it breaks all your opponent's shields.

card.name: Death the Lost, Demon Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards their hand. ■ Revolution 0—Whenever this creature attacks, if you have no shields, it breaks all your opponent's shields.

card.name: Death the Lost, Demon Revolution
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards their hand. ■ Revolution 0—Whenever this creature attacks, if you have no shields, it breaks all your opponent's shields.

card.name: Bearfugan, Super Beast Army
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your nature creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Quattro Breaker ■ Whenever this creature or one of your nature creatures would be destroyed, put them into your mana zone instead.

card.name: Freeze Charger
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ Charger

card.name: Mach 55, Supersonic
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Double Breaker ■ While your opponent has 2 shields or less, this creature can't be destroyed.

card.name: Mega Magma Dragon
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have 5000 power or less.

card.name: Magand, Bloodlust Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. If a shield was returned to your hand, this creature gets +3000 power and "double breaker" until the End Step

card.name: Mauchu, One Extreme
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger

card.name: Holy, Flash Guardian
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, tap all your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Kodamadance Charger
card.text: ■ Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. ■ Charger

card.name: The Mach, Lightning Sonic
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. You may put an evolution creature from among the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Vader, Dark Armor
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ End Step

card.name: Mega Blade Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have "blocker".

card.name: Erikatchu, Snow Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets "shield trigger".

card.name: Raraa, Trust Ball
card.text: ■ Your light Commands cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 light cards in your mana zone, your light Dragons cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Dorunrun, Funeral Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it. Then put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.
